title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Integrated PCK, PK, and CK Simulation for Science Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Core scientific concepts and general awareness of teaching roles
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can explain the interaction principles of PCK, PK, and CK in science lessons and apply them to practical cases.
Learners can separately analyze the three knowledge domains (PCK/PK/CK) in a simulation environment and design integrated approaches.
Participants can quantitatively compare the impact of knowledge integration on instructional effectiveness through VR-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
